$eref.description: The base properties used in all top-level types
$eref.title: core

_88structured-marking.description: A single definition of a structured marking
_88structured-marking.title: structured-marking

___controlled_structures.description: A list of JSONPath statements, rooted at the top-level object that the structured_markings key is contained in, that the marking_refs apply to.

___marking_refs.description: The set of markings applied to the fields selected by the controlled_structures.

___external_ids.description: A list of external identifiers by which this construct may be known.

___link.description: A link to this construct in the external system

___source.description: The source of this ID, i.e. name of an external system.

___revision.description: The revision number of this construct. MUST be omitted if this is the first version, otherwise required.

___type.description: Hardcoded value to indicate what type of construct this is

___created_at.description: Time at which this construct was created.

___marking_refs.description: The set of markings to be applied to this construct

___producer_ref.description: ID to the information source that produced this content

___structured_markings.description: The set of L2 markings to be applied to this construct

___id.description: Globally unique identifier for this construct.

___reference_url.description: A URL pointing to a copy of the documentation that the reference refers to

___reference_title.description: A human-readable title for this object

___reference_type.description: An enum detailing what type of information is referenced

___analysis_by_ref.description: A direct reference containing the Object ID of the Identity who produced or performed the analysis contained in the referenced document. This is not the Identity of who created the STIX Object, but is who performed the analaysis contained in the referenced document. This Object is not related using a Relationship Object as an intermediatary

$eref.description: The impact on operations if this construct were to be realized.
$eref.title: impact

___description.description: A prose description of the impact.

___credibility.description: The credibility of this statement, using the Admirality scale

___level.description: The estimated severity of the impact.

___impact.description: The impact to operations of the TTP(s) that this indicator detects were they to be realized (individually)

___start_time.description: The time at which this indicator should be considered valid. If omitted, unknown.

___end_time.description: The time at which this indicator should no longer be considered valid. If omitted, unknown or ongoing.

___pattern.description: The pattern used to identify the presence of this indicator

$eref.description: A pattern that leverages native CybOX objects to allow pattern matching
$eref.title: twigs

___properties.description: A list of properties that are applied in the condition

___conditions.description: The string conditions for when this indicator should match

___rules.description: The set of snort rules to match this indicator
The set of YARA rules to match this indicator

twigs.description: A pattern that leverages native CybOX objects to allow pattern matching
twigs.title: twigs

___properties.description: A list of properties that are applied in the condition

___key.description: The path to a CybOX object property

___condition.description: The condition by which the property should match the value

___value.description: The value of the field to be matched against

___conditions.description: The string conditions for when this indicator should match

___key.description: The path to a CybOX object property

___condition.description: The condition by which the property should match the value

___value.description: The value of the field to be matched against

$eref.description: A structure to represent external data (e.g. binary, XML)
$eref.title: external

___content_type.description: MIME type of the external data

___content.description: The content itself. Content must either be base64 encoded and base64 must be set to true or it must be escaped per JSON string escape rules.

___charset.description: For content that has an encoding, the charset of the encoded content

___rules.description: The set of snort rules to match this indicator
The set of YARA rules to match this indicator

___object_ref.description: Reference to the object that this matches against.

___condition.description: Describes the type of match. If 'equals', the object should be matched exactly. If 'pattern_match', each field in the object should have a pattern match applied
